Room.Name: Central Arena Preparation Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Oceancrest Central Arena Ready Room.
Room.LongDescription: The Preparation Lounge is designed to be a locker room for the gladiators before they venture out into the arena. To the east is the Warm-Up Arena, where young gladiators and knights may challenge you. Further south is the Knight's Honor Arena. Knights do not initiate the fighting, but will fight a frightening battle once engaged. To the south of the Ready Room is the One-on-One Combat Arena. Only one person may enter this arena at a time to battle the lone gladiator in a one-on-one, hand-to-hand, to the death combat.
